name: Counter-Extortion and Leverage Defense
description: Developing personal and organizational immunity to blackmail-based control.

cards.title: Neutralizing Leverage Through Preemptive Exposure
cards.description: Destroying the power of blackmail before it can be weaponized.
bulletpoints: Using controlled disclosure to eliminate blackmail potential.
Flipping public perception by reframing the narrative.
Creating evidence trails that counteract false kompromat.
cards.summaryText: Defang leverage by disclosing on your terms, reframing the story, and documenting the truth.

cards.title: Psychological Resilience Against Coercion
cards.description: Training in mental fortitude to resist psychological warfare tactics.
bulletpoints: Building a mindset immune to shame-based control mechanisms.
Practicing strategic non-reactivity in high-pressure situations.
Utilizing counter-interrogation tactics to avoid verbal entrapment.
cards.summaryText: Forge a shame-proof mindset, stay non-reactive, and deploy counter-interrogation skills.

cards.title: Forming Counter-Networks for Protection
cards.description: Creating alliances that counteract elite blackmail structures.
bulletpoints: Building decentralized communities resistant to infiltration.
Developing independent economic systems to bypass financial control.
Establishing trust networks that minimize individual vulnerabilities.
cards.summaryText: Assemble decentralized allies, alternative economies, and tight trust webs to blunt blackmail.
